runes.name: Knock

Each Chest within 3 tiles has a 50% chance to become unlocked
upgrades: Door unlock duration increased by 5 seconds
+10% Chest Unlock chance
+10% Chance to not consume Rune on usage

runes.name: Mend
description: Heals 50 Health immediately

Has a 50% chance to remove each Bleed and Disease effect on player

Healing duration increased by 2 seconds
Bleed and Disease removal chance increased by 10%
1 Additional random player within 8 tiles will also be affected
+5% Chance to not consume Rune on usage

+5% Chance to not consume Rune on usage
